title: Kaathiruppan Kamalakannan Lyrics Uthama Puthiran (1958)
stanzas:
aathangaraiyinile
andhi pozhuthinile(2)
poo tamizh malar pole
punitha rathai varugai
kaana Kaathiruppaan
kamala kannan

gopiyar konjum sallaaban
gopiyar konjum sallaaban
venkuzhal isai amudhoottum
ezhilodu sugam kaattum (2)
gopiyar konjum sallaaban

thaavi pidippaan...
thaavi pidippaan
vennai thayir kudathai
thaduppaan.
tharayil amarndhu
raadhai uruvam varaindhu kondu
angu Kaathiruppaan
kamala kannan

vedikaiyaai seivaan alangaaram
vedikaiyaai seivaan alangaaram
veenai isaikka solli
venduvaan sila neram.
vedikaiyaai seivaan alangaaram

paaduvaan adharku
aval aaduvaal(2)
maru neram
paaduvaan adharku
aval aaduvaal
maru neram

paadham nogumae
endru parivudan
kadhal inbamae
thandha naayagan
vandhu Kaathiruppaan
kamala kannan
